problem.markdown:
What does ISCI's research focus on? Check all that apply.
[x] infer location of video based on context/content [x] faster searches without GPS [x] find a more efficient way of sorting untagged things into categories without manually tagging [x] using actual geo-tags to train algorithm
problem.p: What does ISCI's research focus on? Check all that apply.

checkboxgroup.choice: infer location of video based on context/content
find a more efficient way of sorting untagged things into categories without manually tagging
using actual geo-tags to train algorithm
